name: Demon Arena
description:
It’s the day, demons are being summoned from everywhere and you have to save the world. Kill all the demons having in mind that you will sacrifice yourself to use your most powerful shot.

CONTROLS

Movement - ASDW 
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Mouse Left Button
Special Attack - Space
Pause - P

Extra Features
  • Every time you use your special attack  your current character will be sacrificed.
  • When a demon hits you, the last character of the row will die, and a shield will protect you  from being damaged again.
  • You can keep pressed the Shoot button to shoot as fast as possible.
  • The GOD shot will follow your mouse, you only have to shoot the first time.
THANKS FOR PLAYING!! I really hope you love the game!!

Music by: Matt Winchell
